description: Flake8 is a python tool that glues together pycodestyle, pyflakes, mccabe, and third-party plugins to check the style and quality of some python code.

-h.description: show this help message and exit

-v.description: Print more information... This option is repeatable...

--append-config.description: Provide extra config files to parse...

--config.description: Path to the config file that will be the authoritative config source...

--enable-extensions.description: Enable plugins and extensions that are otherwise disabled by default

--require-plugins.description: Require specific plugins to be installed before running

--version.description: show program's version number and exit

-q.description: Report only file names, or nothing. This option is repeatable.

--color.description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`.

--count.description: Print total number of errors to standard output...

--exclude.description: Comma-separated list of files or directories to exclude. (Default: [...])

--extend-exclude.description: Comma-separated list of files or directories to add to the list of excluded ones.

--filename.description: Only check for filenames matching the patterns... (Default: ['*.py'])

--stdin-display-name.description: The name used when reporting errors from code passed via stdin... (Default: stdin)

--format.description: Format errors according to the chosen formatter... (Default: default)

--hang-closing.description: Hang closing bracket instead of matching indentation...

--ignore.description: Comma-separated list of error codes to ignore... (Default: E121,E123,E126,E226,E24,E704,W503,W504)

--extend-ignore.description: Comma-separated list of error codes to add to the list of ignored ones.

--per-file-ignores.description: A pairing of filenames and violation codes...

--max-doc-length.description: Maximum allowed doc line length... (Default: None)

--indent-size.description: Number of spaces used for indentation (Default: 4)

--select.description: Limit the reported error codes to codes prefix-matched by this list...

--extend-select.description: Add additional error codes to the default `--select`...

--show-source.description: Show the source generate each error or warning.

--exit-zero.description: Exit with status code "0" even if there are errors.

-j.description: Number of subprocesses to use... (Default: auto)

--benchmark.description: Print benchmark information about this run of Flake8

--bug-report.description: Print information necessary when preparing a bug report

--doctests.description: [pyflakes] also check syntax of the doctests

--radon-show-closures.description: [radon] Add closures/inner classes to the output

notes: Installed plugins: mccabe: 0.7.0, pycodestyle: 2.13.0, pyflakes: 3.3.2, radon: 6.0.1
